sections.heading: monuments; defacing prohibited; penalty
sections.text: Any person who shall destroy, deface, remove or injure any of the monuments erected by the state to mark the Oregon Trail in Nebraska shall be deemed guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1911, c. 134, ยง 4, p. 447;R.S.1913, ยง 7177;C.S.1922, ยง 6828;C.S.1
